hero.subtitle: A mark of rigor and excellence, for 30 years
hero.description: For three decades, our company has put its expertise at the service of ambitious projects, combining precision, durability and operational excellence. Each construction site is approached with a keen attention to detail, proven technical mastery and a constant commitment to quality.Our priority: building solid, reliable and sustainable structures that reflect our passion for the trade and the trust our clients have placed in us for 30 years.

founder.title: The Founder
founder.name: Rama Marie-Jos√© DIOP
founder.description:
Dynamic, rigorous and results-oriented professional, I stand out for my ability to manage complex projects while ensuring harmonious coordination of multidisciplinary teams. With an excellent sense of organization and great adaptability, I combine technical skills, leadership and strategic vision to achieve set objectives.

With significant experience in managing and supervising technical study projects (buildings, structures, infrastructure), I have developed solid expertise in planning, budget management, execution monitoring and interdisciplinary coordination. My mastery of digital tools and modern project management methods allows me to ensure quality, respect for deadlines and resource optimization.

Curious, committed and passionate about operational excellence, I fully invest in the development of innovative and sustainable solutions in the service of technical and organizational performance.
founder.description1: Ambitious, rigorous and performance-oriented professional, I stand out through a proven ability to manage large-scale projects while ensuring harmonious coordination of multidisciplinary teams. Thanks to a strong sense of organization, excellent priority management and great adaptability, I have developed a structured approach that combines rigor, methodology and strategic vision. This approach allows me to efficiently lead the projects entrusted to me, anticipate operational risks and ensure smooth communication with the various stakeholders. My background has allowed me to acquire in-depth expertise in the design, planning and management of technical study projects, covering various areas such as buildings, structures and infrastructure. I have contributed to complex projects requiring advanced skills in technical analysis, strategic planning, budget management, interdisciplinary coordination and rigorous execution monitoring. My role has also led me to collaborate with architects, engineers, design offices, external service providers, as well as administrative authorities, which has allowed me to develop strong interpersonal skills and a real ability to unite around common objectives.
founder.description2: My mastery of digital tools, business software and contemporary project management methodologies (including risk management, strategic prioritization, dashboard design, analytical reporting and resource optimization) allows me to constantly add value at every stage of the project cycle. I pay particular attention to technical compliance, deliverable quality, strict respect for deadlines and cost rationalization, while guaranteeing a solutions and results-oriented approach. Driven by an intellectual curiosity that encourages continuous learning, I fully engage in innovation, digitalization and sustainability initiatives. I place great importance on continuous process improvement, technical and sector monitoring, as well as the development of modern solutions adapted to operational and environmental challenges. I also give an essential place to collaboration, skill sharing and the creation of a stimulating professional environment, promoting collective performance and self-transcendence. Driven by a deep sense of responsibility and a constant will for excellence, I invest myself with determination in the success of the projects I manage. My goal is to make a significant contribution, based on commitment, transparency, rigor and efficiency, to sustainably support the technical, organizational and strategic performance of the structures I accompany.

career.title: Career
career.description: Discover the professional and academic background of Rama Marie-Jos√© DIOP, founder of THETA Engineering.

items.description: Specialized reinforced concrete engineer, passionate about technical challenges and innovative solutions, I lead the structural engineering department at THETA Engineering. My expertise covers the design and calculation of complex structures, with a constant commitment to safety, durability and performance. My role consists of managing ambitious projects, from initial analysis to completion, ensuring team coordination and client satisfaction. I strive to propose tailor-made technical solutions that respect standards, deadlines and budgets.

I also had the honor of collaborating with IFC ‚Äì International Finance Corporation as a Project Manager & Consultant, where I participated in managing internal renovation projects and acted as a structural consultant for IFC's new regional headquarters in Senegal. I fully invest myself to ensure safe, sustainable and standards-compliant structures, while ensuring quality, deadlines and costs.

As part of the construction project for IFC's regional office in Dakar, Senegal, I was a consultant for Adjaye Associates to support and supervise the entire mission related to the delegated project. My responsibilities included: strategic and operational support to the project owner, coordination between technical and institutional partners, monitoring of legal and contractual aspects related to the delegation of project ownership, control of compliance with IFC international standards and local requirements.
Management of various renovation projects for IFC and local requirements
I worked as a site engineer on projects in Dakar. IFC renovation projects and local requirements.

about.title: Who we are ?
about.description:
We are an engineering firm committed to offering reliable, innovative and sustainable technical solutions. Thanks to our multidisciplinary expertise, we support our clients at every stage: from structural studies (reinforced concrete, steel frame, wood) to rigorous construction supervision, including complete project management.

We also work in interior decoration and landscaping to create functional, aesthetic spaces adapted to their uses. Our mission is to guarantee the quality, safety and performance of each structure, while respecting deadlines and current standards.

With a qualified and passionate team, we build sustainable projects that combine technique, design and excellence.

items.title: Structural Studies ‚Äî Reinforced Concrete
items.description: Sizing, regulatory compliance and design for durability.
items.text: We carry out structural studies in reinforced concrete ensuring the safety, compliance and durability of your structures. Our engineers perform rigorous calculations, propose optimized constructive solutions and produce the execution plans necessary for the smooth running of the construction site.Our services:
list: Stability calculations and sizing (columns, beams, slabs, foundations)
Numerical modeling and verification under real loads
Writing calculation notes and reinforcement plans
Economic and technical-economic optimization of constructive solutions
Technical monitoring during construction phase and response to execution situations

items.title: Structural Studies ‚Äî Steel Frame
items.description: Design, rationalization and control for high-performance steel structures.
items.text: We design high-performance steel frames adapted to architectural and industrial constraints. From pre-study to final calculation note, we ensure complete treatment of load, assembly and foundation recovery issues.
list: Preliminary studies and choice of structural solutions (profiles, assemblies)
Resistance and buckling calculations, verification of assemblies (welded/bolted)
Writing frame plans, assembly details with parts nomenclatures
Coordination with workshop production and quality control of manufactured elements
Advice on cost/performance optimization and anti-corrosion treatment

items.title: Structural Studies ‚Äî Wood
items.description: Sizing, regulatory compliance and design for durability.
list: Sizing of wood elements (beams, trusses, columns, decking) and choice of species
Structural modeling taking into account creep, shrinkage and hygrothermal interactions
Design of assemblies (tenons, plates, metal connectors) and constructive details
Development of frame plans and technical sheets for workshop
Integration of mixed solutions (wood-metal, wood-concrete) to optimize performance and cost

items.title: Construction Supervision
items.description: Ensuring quality, compliance with deadlines and technical compliance.
items.text: Our Construction Supervision service guarantees rigorous management of each stage of your project, from site opening to final acceptance. We ensure precise operational management to guarantee execution quality, schedule compliance and cost control.
list: Weekly monitoring of work progress
Coordination of teams and technical stakeholders
Verification of compliance with plans, standards and HSE rules
Management of unforeseen events and solution optimization
Regular reporting for complete site visibility
items.text2: We provide complete, transparent and structured support to guarantee the success of your project under the best conditions.

items.title: Project Management ‚Äì Frames
items.description: Planning, coordination and technical control of structures.
items.text: We handle project management related to metal and wood frames, integrating the technical, regulatory and economic imperatives specific to the construction sector.
list: Preliminary studies and needs analysis
Coordination between engineers, architects and frame companies
Planning of execution phases and schedule management
Workshop manufacturing monitoring and quality control
On-site assembly supervision
Risk management and structural optimization
Final control and acceptance of structures
items.text2: Thanks to a methodical approach and an in-depth understanding of frame systems, we guarantee solidity, precision and durability on each project.

items.title: Interior Decoration
items.description: Creation of functional, aesthetic spaces adapted to your uses.
items.text: We design and carry out interior decoration projects combining design, ergonomics and visual identity. Our objective: transform your spaces into harmonious, inspiring and fully functional places.
list: Analysis of needs, uses and technical constraints
Design of moodboards, 2D plans and 3D renderings
Selection of materials, textures, colors and furniture
Optimization of lighting and volumes
Monitoring of realization and coordination of craftsmen
Installation of the final decoration
items.text2: Our approach combines artistic sense and technical mastery of building to guarantee a coherent, sustainable and tailor-made result.

items.title: Landscaping
items.description: Design and realization of durable and aesthetic outdoor spaces
items.text: Our landscaping service structures and enhances your outdoor spaces by combining environmental requirements, functionality and aesthetics.
list: Development studies and landscape design
Integration of plants, materials and outdoor furniture
Creation of gardens, terraces, paths, relaxation areas...
Installation of irrigation systems and outdoor lighting
Monitoring and coordination of works
Maintenance and upkeep of created spaces
items.text2: We design durable, pleasant outdoor environments perfectly integrated into their architectural environment.
